A,B,C = map(int, input().split())

count = 0
while B >= A and count < C:
    B -= A

    count += 1
print(count)

A,B,C = map(int, input().split())

if (B >= A):
    count = 0
    while B >= A and count < C:
        B -= A
        count += 1
    print(count)
else:
    print(0)
